Suspicious about the bot, Naga came forward a little. He felt like 
this bot could be trusted.

Naga: I ask the questions here! (His tone eased up) I am Naga, of the 
Tripredacus Strikers. Who might you be?

this

> here... well the last time that I hunted here was 6 months ago*. But
